events.name: Economic Theory emphasizes that in well-functioning markets, over the upper bound on 2018-2030 cumulative Co demand represents close to 10% of identified terrestrial resources (1.5% also including sea bed resources, see paragraphs below).
events.wd_label: Economic Theory emphasizes that in well-functioning markets, over the upper bound on 2018-2030 cumulative Co demand represents close to 10% of identified terrestrial resources (1.5% also including sea bed resources, see paragraphs below).

events.name: The ratio between reserves reported in 2018 and 2030 demand (upper bound) is 16 years (termed the static depletion index), compared with 46 years for those same reserves divided by 2018 production.
events.wd_label: The ratio between reserves reported in 2018 and 2030 demand (upper bound) is 16 years (termed the static depletion index), compared with 46 years for those same reserves divided by 2018 production.

events.name: Another area of future study would explore the longer term implications of cobalt demand and supply for the industry's development.
events.wd_label: Another area of future study would explore the longer term implications of cobalt demand and supply for the industry's development.
